title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump, Putin Agree to Syria Cease-fire
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump, Putin Agree to Syria Cease-fire
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Nick Wadhams Foreign Policy Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin stretched their first-ever meeting beyond the two-hour mark on Friday and emerged with an agreement for a cease-fire in southwest Syria in the hopes of finding a path to resolve that nation’s punishing civil war.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
